title: Ask Riot: Easter eggs and books

replies.body: Another easter egg.  In Twisted Treeline, if you look at Vilemaw's nest, you can see the skeleton of Ebonmaw, the boss of the legacy Twisted Treeline.
I love finding Easter eggs!  It really adds a little special something to the game. :) Keep adding them, please - and thank you. ^^

Another easter egg I believe :D In the Ivern ability videos, the subject he uses his abilities on is caitlyn because originally she was supposed to place bushes in her kit. :) She has traps instead of course, but Ivern actually has bushes so it's a subtle easter egg :3
{{champion:17}}
It's a shame we haven't found more easter eggs yet.
Please expand on Ekkos lore since unlike everyone else all Ekkos lore tells is that He is a runaway/rebel and other then that he has no connections
{{champion:55}}  book plz

In the early days of the new Summoner's Rift, you could stand in the dragon pit and spam laugh right at the start of the game.  You'd hear the booming laugh of the dragon back at you.  I wonder why they removed that?
Near the tri bush in at bot lane there is a hole and him you position your camera in a way you can see a slice of pizza and a sai, refrencing Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles{{champion:1}}
I was in game once, and I actually saw that hole explode open.  Ever since, it has always been open in the map
Can you give us a rough estimate on how many easter eggs we have missed?
Who remembers those newspaper type updates that used to come every patch in the client?
{{champion:432}}
I like the idea of the character books mostly, but the history of league would be VERY INTERESTING!

the riot code for when the servers are down is thereisnourflevel when you open league and the launch button is grayed use it to get to login screen but you won't be able to login unless you have a riot account
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Also, books would be wonderful... but you keep changing the lore of characters... Still, I think something perhaps like the Magic the Gathering books would be awesome. :3
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
That was it? You guys answered TWO question? What's even the point of these?
Oi Rito does a great job at making this game and they try really hard. Maybe u shouldnt go around judging them and taking everything they do for granted
Yeah, slightly disappointed this week.
